data.text: @markpoloncarz So important that you fired the ones that didn't take your jab. You and that witch in Albany are pieces of shi! and should be jailed. Where's your GF Dr overtime now on all this????? Ohhhhh it's over so no more free $

@markpoloncarz You need more healthcare workers because of the mandated vaccines….. many were fired or had to quit. Democrats calling for these mandates didn’t value these healthcare workers. Less people will take healthcare jobs & many found other occupations.

@markpoloncarz The Democrats are going to say whatever they need to say to get your vote in November.  Don't forget what they have done to us during this pandemic.  The Democrats have ruined their cities and states

@zenergy7 @markpoloncarz Police and firemen don't get paid near what they should get paid.  They risk their life daily for us.  Teachers in healthcare workers don't risk their lives daily they're important don't get me wrong their jobs are very important but they don't go to work and risk their life.

@markpoloncarz United Airlines is hiring back its unvaccinated employees … hopefully with backpay and a huge apology … how about if @GovKathyHochul?

@markpoloncarz So important that y’all let how many go sue to not having a vaccine which is now not even a requirement lmao… you politicians create a disaster then pretend to fix the issue ..
